CustomField.description: If you are rolling up from grandchildren -> grandparent (or greater), supply the field path to the ultimate parent field. As an example, if you were rolling up from Opp Line Items to Account AnnualRevenue, you would do "Opportunity.Account.AnnualRevenue"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If you are rolling up from grandchildren -> grandparent (or greater), supply the field path to the ultimate parent field. As an example, if you were rolling up from Opp Line Items to Account AnnualRevenue, you would do "Opportunity.Account.AnnualRevenue"
CustomField.label: Grandparent Relationship Field Path
